mapper.sql: id, parent_id, polygon, color, border, area_id, center, operator, operate_time, operate_ip
mapper.insert: insert into grid_grid (id, parent_id, polygon, color, border, area_id, center, operator, operate_time, operate_ip) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{parentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{polygon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{color,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{border,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{areaId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{center,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{operateIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

id,
parent_id,
polygon,
color,

operate_time,
operate_ip,

mapper.update:
update grid_grid
parent_id = #{parentId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
polygon = #{polygon,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
color = #{color,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
border = #{border,jdbcType=INTEGER},
area_id = #{areaId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
center = #{center,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
operator = #{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
operate_time = #{operateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
operate_ip = #{operateIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update grid_grid set parent_id = #{parentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, polygon = #{polygon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, color = #{color,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, border = #{border,jdbcType=INTEGER}, area_id = #{areaId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, center = #{center,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, operator = #{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, operate_time = #{operateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, operate_ip = #{operateIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT a.id,a.area_id,a.polygon,a.color,a.center,a.operator,a.operate_time,a.operate_ip, b.name,b.level,b.parent_id FROM grid_grid as a left join sys_area as b on a.area_id = b.id
SELECT a.id,a.area_id,a.polygon,a.color,a.center,a.operator,a.operate_time,a.operate_ip, b.name,b.level,b.parent_id FROM grid_grid as a left join sys_area as b on a.area_id = b.id where b.parent_id=1
SELECT a.id,a.polygon,a.area_id,a.color,a.center,a.border,b.parent_id,b.name,b.level FROM grid_grid as a left join sys_area as b on a.area_id = b.id where b.parent_id=#{id}
select parent_id from sys_area where id=#{id}
mapper.update:
update grid_grid
parent_id = #{parentId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
polygon = #{polygon,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
color = #{color,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
border = #{border,jdbcType=INTEGER},
area_id = #{areaId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
center = #{center,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
operator = #{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
operate_time = #{operateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
operate_ip = #{operateIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where area_id = #{areaId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
